title: BRIEF-Partners Value Investments Lp Announces Renewal Of Normal Course Issuer Bid
text:
BRIEF-Partners Value Investments Lp Announces Renewal Of Normal Course Issuer Bid

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 07:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Partners Value Investments Lp Announces Renewal Of Normal Course Issuer Bid Sept 30 (Reuters) - Partners Value Investments LP : * PARTNERS VALUE INVESTMENTS LP ANNOUNCES RENEWAL OF NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID * PARTNERS VALUE INVESTMENTS LP - BID TO PURCHASE UP TO 3.7 MILLION OF ITS NON-VOTING EQUITY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP UNITS * PARTNERS VALUE INVESTMENTS LP - PERIOD OF BID WILL REMAIN EFFECTIVE FROM OCT 1, 2019 TO SEPT 30, 2020

BRIEF-Partners Value Investments Lp Announces Renewal Of Normal Course Issuer Bid
description: BRIEF-Partners Value Investments Lp Announces Renewal Of Normal Course Issuer Bid
